Activity: Arrive at work, check emails. Review the deployment plan for the EHR system updates/modifications.
Work with the QA team @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to address any issues or defects identified during the testing session. Make any necessary code changes or configuration adjustments.
Assist the training coordinator @trainer-1 with the development of training materials for the new EHR system features. Provide technical expertise and guidance.

Prepare a change management plan for the deployment of the EHR system updates/modifications. This plan should outline the steps required to communicate the changes to users and provide support during the transition.
Lunch Break - Go out for lunch with colleagues.
Monitor the Help Desk @helpdesk-1 to address any questions or issues that arise during the initial deployment of the EHR system updates/modifications.
Document any lessons learned during the development and deployment process. Use this information to improve future EHR system updates/modifications.
Review the progress of the EHR integration project and identify any areas that require further attention. Prioritize tasks for next week.
Prepare a weekly status report summarizing the progress of the EHR integration project. Distribute the report to stakeholders.
Clean up the workstation and organize files. Back up any important data.
Wrap up and head home. Happy Friday!
